postMessage:
Install: npm install @giscus/react

Setup:
1. Enable GitHub Discussions on your repo
2. Install the Giscus app: https://github.com/apps/giscus
3. Get your config at: https://giscus.app
4. Update repo, repoId, category, and categoryId in comments.tsx

Usage: <Comments slug={post.slug} />
